description: Colour film record of the visit to Melbourne of Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II and His Royal Highness the Duke of Edinburgh. The three crowded, exciting days are show in detail. Includes the arrival of Her Majesty, presentation of the cup at the races at Flemington, a glittering State reception, service at Scot's Church, Myer Music Bowl concert, Moomba parade, waving to country children en route to open the Royal Children's Hospital, investiture at Government House, and farewell at the wharf.
